name: StyleClass
description: StyleClass manages css classes declaratively to during enter/leave animations or just to toggle classes on an element.

properties.name: children
properties.description: Used to get the child elements of the component.

properties.name: enterActiveClassName
properties.description: Style class to add during enter animation.

properties.name: enterClassName
properties.description: Style class to add when item begins to get displayed.

properties.name: enterFromClassName
properties.description: Style class to add when item begins to get displayed.

properties.name: enterToClassName
properties.description: Style class to add when item begins to get displayed.

properties.name: hideOnOutsideClick
properties.description: Whether to trigger leave animation when outside of the element is clicked.

properties.name: leaveActiveClassName
properties.description: Style class to add during leave animation.

properties.name: leaveClassName
properties.description: Style class to add when item begins to get hidden.

properties.name: leaveFromClassName
properties.description: Style class to add when item begins to get hidden.

properties.name: leaveToClassName
properties.description: Style class to add when leave animation is completed.

properties.name: nodeRef
properties.description: A React reference to DOM element that need to specify. Required.

properties.name: selector
properties.description: Selector to define the target element.

properties.name: toggleClassName
properties.description: Adds or removes a class when no enter-leave animation is required.
